name: NSTextElement
desc: An abstract base class that represents the smallest units of text layout such as paragraphs or attachments.

items.name: init(textContentManager: NSTextContentManager?)
items.desc: Creates a new text element with the content manager you provide.

items.name: var textContentManager: NSTextContentManager?
items.desc: The value that represents the current content manager.

items.name: var elementRange: NSTextRange?
items.desc: Represents the range of the element inside the document.
